P

Player - Class in com.example.tresenraya
 
Player(String, String) - Constructor for class com.example.tresenraya.Player
 
playerClickACell(View) - Method in class com.example.tresenraya.MainActivity
When a player clicks on a cell 1 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 2 -> We get the index of the pressed cell 3 -> With this index we call playerSelectCell
playerSelectCell(Cell) - Method in class com.example.tresenraya.MainActivity
When a player selects a cell, 1 -> Check that the cell is not null 2 -> Check that the cell has no owner 3 -> Check that the game is started (turn! = 0) 4 -> We award to the cell as owner the player who has the turn 5 -> We put the corresponding color in the cell 6 -> Check if the play makes the player a winner 7 -> We calculate and update how many vacant cells are left 8 -> We switch to the next turn
